name: Stanislav

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building complete web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Focused on clean, maintainable code and user-friendly interfaces.

services.title: Front-End Development
services.description: Developing interactive UI components with React. Experience with routing, state management, API integration, and reusable component design.

services.title: Back-End Development
services.description: Creating server-side logic using Node.js and Express.js. Building RESTful APIs, managing data with MongoDB, and ensuring secure and scalable server functionality.

services.title: Deployment & Version Control
services.description: Deploying applications using platforms like Netlify, Vercel, or Render. Version control and collaboration using Git and GitHub.

aboutpara: I'm a passionate junior full-stack developer eager to create efficient and user-friendly web applications. Currently improving my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js through real projects and continuous learning. Motivated to contribute to innovative teams and deliver quality code.

resume.description: I'm a junior full-stack developer focused on building web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

education.universityPara: Currently enrolled in an intensive full-stack development program where I am gaining hands-on experience with front-end and back-end technologies. The curriculum covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and best practices in web development. I am building real-world projects to strengthen my coding skills and prepare for professional software development roles
